name: Beauty T-Shirt Designer
description:
Did you ever dream about to design your own T-shirt? Now it is the time to do it yourself. Design your t-shirt with a nice design and choose the color that you want.

Doing a T-shirt design is a very interesting thing and there is a shop working in designing this. Do you wanna design your own T-shirt? This is not a dream girls, play this game and you can make a amazing T-shirt design!
